content.body: With https://github.com/tc39/proposal-import-bytes, it can be done like `import ... with { type: 'bytes' }` + `textDecoder.decode(buffer)`
content.formatted_body: With https://github.com/tc39/proposal-import-bytes, it can be done like import ... with { type: 'bytes' } + textDecoder.decode(buffer)

content.body: There was some appetite for it in the last meeting, strongly pushed for by eemeli
content.formatted_body: There was some appetite for it in the last meeting, strongly pushed for by @eemeli:mozilla.org

content.body: yeah I think if someone champions it people are in favor
I don't think I've the bandwidth for putting together an import-text proposal for the next plenary, but in case no-one else does, I can try to do so for Tokyo.

@leaverou:matrix.org you can see the notes from the related discussion here: https://github.com/tc39/notes/pull/379/files#diff-16e44c4f2f7e8f811605c9425be9e53906830267d08666efe463e866801d96f7R355-R501
